record.description: Clark Shaughnessy of the Maroons talks over some of the many plays he will use this season with a few of his regulars. Chicago football hopes are higher than in many seasons and the squad is rapidly rounding into shape for the opening game with Nebraska at Lincoln a week from today.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached caption, archives stamp. Vertical crease down the photo, put in Mylar.
